title: laali yugavayya
sahitya:
lAli yugavayyA nA pAli daivamA rAmA 

anupallavi

mAlimi gala sIta tOnu mancamunanu pavvaLinci

caraNam 1

shrI kOsalapura nivAsa jIva dEva cidvilAsa pAkAri maNi prakAsha padmanAbha darahAsa

caraNam 2

sura bhAmalu prEmamIra sogasugAnu pADaga sura taru suma varShamulu suralu kuriya jEyagA

caraNam 3

pAlu venna paramAnnamu bAguga nIvAraginci baluDaina tyAgarAju
 bhASaNamula nAlakinci
